pinyin: Mai4 di2 xun4 Guang3 chang3 Hua1 yuan2
Mai4 di2 xun4 hua1 yuan2 guang3 chang3

sentences.english: Your opinion of T-Mac is about 4 years past due .
sentences.chinese: 你關於麥迪的觀點是還停留在4年前。

sentences.english: The staggering totals indicate why McGrady needed to get to the hoop.
sentences.chinese: 搖擺不定的數據表明了爲什麼麥迪需要更靠近籃圈。

sentences.english: Tracy was scared by Artest for the last several plays.
sentences.chinese: 阿泰斯特最後幾次的表現，麥迪好像被嚇到了。

sentences.english: Tmac just said that this loss is because of Yao's absence, and I agree.
sentences.chinese: 麥迪只是說這次輸了是因爲姚明不在，我同意他說的。

sentences.english: McGrady himself called it "crazy" that he has received so many All-Star votes.
sentences.chinese: 麥迪對自己得到這麼多全明星選票的形容是“瘋狂”。

sentences.english: We need bonzi. Should buy out mcgrady's contract.
sentences.chinese: 我們需要棒子，我們應該買斷麥迪的合同。

sentences.english: "Tracy, he will find people, " Adelman said.
I think T-Mac will change his number. Do you have any news about it?
sentences.chinese: 我認爲麥迪要換他的號碼了，你有什麼消息嗎？

sentences.english: Since when are Battier and T-Mac true leader ?
sentences.chinese: 巴蒂爾和麥迪什麼時候才能成爲真正的領袖？

sentences.english: McGrady became a star that year.
sentences.chinese: 在那一年，麥迪成爲了一位巨星。

sentences.english: T-mac is the man for the clutch shot without a doubt.
sentences.chinese: 勿庸置疑，麥迪就是能把握進攻的那個人。

sentences.english: Every time, I don't like to here others say that T-mac is out of date.
sentences.chinese: 每次我都不喜歡聽別人說麥迪已經過時了。

sentences.english: And whoever said T-Mac have no clue. Without TMac we lose this game.
sentences.chinese: 無論誰說麥迪沒主意，可是沒有麥迪我們會輸掉比賽。

sentences.english: And whoever said T-Mac have no clue. Without TMac we lose this game.
sentences.chinese: 無論誰說麥迪沒主意，可是沒有麥迪我們會輸掉比賽。

sentences.english: Today Medina Walker on the crown of red anger, and how many have joined Artest of the tube.
sentences.chinese: 今天麥迪對沃克的衝冠一怒，多少和阿泰的加盟有管。

definition: Time Warner Inc., US media company
